about.whatIsTitle: What is a Past Life Reading?
about.whatIsText: A past life reading combines Eastern Saju philosophy with Western astrology to explore the patterns, talents, and karmic lessons your soul has carried from previous lives. It provides profound insights into why your soul chose this current life and what growth it seeks to achieve in this incarnation.
about.sajuText: Saju philosophy analyzes the Heavenly Stems and Earthly Branches of your birth time to determine your Geokguk (energy pattern). The Geokguk represents your soul's fundamental energy pattern, revealing the essence of your soul that has continued from past lives. There are 8 patterns: Siksin (Creator), Sanggwan (Revolutionary), Jeonggwan (Leader), Pyeongwan (Warrior), Jeongjae (Preserver), Pyeonjae (Adventurer), Jeongin (Sage), and Pyeongin (Mystic).
about.nodesText: In Western astrology, the North Node represents the direction your soul needs to develop in this life, while the South Node indicates patterns already familiar from past lives. The North Node's position shows the direction of your soul's evolution, helping you understand the habits carried from past lives and the new lessons to learn in this life.
about.purposeText: Saturn is the planet of karma, representing the areas we must master and the lessons we must learn in this life. Saturn's position shows the tasks left unfinished from past lives or the fears you need to overcome. The house containing Saturn is the area where you will experience the greatest maturity and growth, allowing you to repay karmic debts and evolve your soul.
